title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 8 - Nuisances Which May Affect Life And Health
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 8 - Nuisances Which May Affect Life And Health

State Regulations
§ 8.1 - All complaints to be investigated
§ 8.2 - Health officer to file report with local board
§ 8.3 - Action to be taken by local board
§ 8.4 - Health officer to report to state commissioner of health
§ 8.5 - State commissioner of health may direct local board of health to take certain definite proceedings
§ 8.6 - Presiding officer to convene local board and take action directed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 8

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §225

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
